verbs.description: [ARG0: art community] [V: provides] [ARG1: expressive sanctuary for creators the purple elephant art community is an art gallery and studio hosting eight artists each with a different specialization the community uses the space to hone their craft while teaching classes selling art and hosting two art shows a year for the surrounding community debra reese marce maldonado marcos flores art cypress kelsey sampson elem gigi flores gia monticelli hamilton middle school paige kuhn cook middle school jerrie glidden purple elephant community devin nelson shirley scarpetta purple elephant purple elephant art community sampson elem alyssa]
